Address.value: 6500 NORTH MINERAL DRIVE,SUITE 200, COEUR D'ALENE, Idaho, 83815-9408, United States

Industry.label: Industry
Industry.value: Mining & Quarrying of Nonmetallic Minerals (No Fuels)

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hecla Mining Co produces and explores silver, gold, lead, and zinc. Its main silver mines include Idaho-based Lucky Friday and Greens Creek in Alaska. Hecla acquired 100% of the Greens Creek from Rio Tinto in April 2008, after holding a 29% interest for 20 years. The acquisition doubled the company's silver production. The operating business segments are the Greens Creek unit, the Lucky Friday unit, the Casa Berardi unit, the San Sebastian unit, and the Nevada Operations unit.

value.name: Carlos Aguiar
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
